abstract: A two-minute clip by a Filipino software engineer won a climate change video contest sponsored by the Asian Development Bank.
snippet: A two-minute clip by a Filipino software engineer won a climate change video contest sponsored by the Asian Development Bank.
lead_paragraph: How to fight climate change? Well, you could start by just saving some electricity. Or saying no to plastic bags. Or turning off the tap while you brush your teeth.

headline.main: ‘How to Save the World’ Wins Web Video Contest
